channel.title: Server Message Block (SMB) :: HackForge
channel.description: Initial Scans Netbios scan nbtscan -r $ip Enumerate host name nmblookup -A $ip List Shares #1 (specifying guest account) smbmap -H $ip -u guest List Shares #2 smbclient -L \\$ip List Shares #3 crackmapexec smb $ip --shares List Shares with credentials smbmap -u $user -p $password -R -H $ip Exhaustive Scan enum4linux -a -M -l -d $ip Check Null Sessions smbmap -H $ip Check Null Sessions
